attributes.action: Abolish the antiquated and ludicrous modern use of titles Right Hon/Hon Friend and Noble Lord/Baroness etc - given the recent disgraceful behaviour of many Members of both Houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vast numbers of the Populace are absolutely appalled by the disgraceful revelations by the highly-respected Daily Telegraph newspaper re some Members of both Houses 'flipping' homes or claiming reimbursement for outrageous sums of tax payers' money for such items as moat cleaning, new driveway gates etc.  All of these recently revealed shortcomings have brought both Houses into disrepute - therefore the use of 'Right Hon'..'Hon'...Friend and the 'Noble' ..Lord etc are now treated with derision by the General Public

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
